actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to top-of-the-stove stainless steel cooking ware from the Republic of Korea entered between January 1, 1999 and January 22, 2003.

summary.text: Directs U.S. Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of top-of-the-stove stainless steel cooking ware from the Republic of Korea.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to top-of-the-stove stainless steel cooking ware from the Republic of Korea entered between January 1, 1999 and January 22, 2003.
